getAllUserRewards(uint256,address[],addr.details: Returns a list all rewards of a user, including already accrued and unrealized claimable rewards

params.scaledBalanceTokens: List of incentivized assets to check eligible distributions. It's used only for v3. It should be address of AToken or VariableDebtToken

returns.availableBorrows: The borrowing power left of the user in USD
returns.currentLiquidationThreshold: The liquidation threshold of the user
returns.healthFactor: The current health factor of the user
returns.ltv: The loan to value of The user
returns.totalCollateral: The total collateral of the user in USD. The unit is 100000000
returns.totalDebt: The total debt of the user in USD

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

approvePool().notice: If new assets are added into the pool, it needs to be called.

borrow(uint256,address,uint256,uint256).notice: The user must approve the delegation to this SC for the asset's debtToken.

getRewardAPRs(uint256,address).notice: The returned APRs are scaneld by 18

getUserAccountData(uint256,address).notice: Returns the user account data across all the reserves

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: return if the forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions to us. the forwarder is required to verify the sender's signature, and verify the call is not a replay.

repay(uint256,address,uint256,uint256).notice: The user must approve this SC for the asset.

supply(uint256,address,uint256).notice: The user must approve this SC for the asset.

withdraw(uint256,address,uint256).notice: The user must approve this SC for the asset's aToken.
